title: GET_PLAYER_PED
content:
0x6E31E993// GetPlayerPed
Entity GET_PLAYER_PED(char* playerSrc);Parameters:playerSrc: The player source, passed as a string.Returns: Returns a valid Ped Entity ID if the passed playerSrc is valid, 0 if not.Used to get the player's Ped Entity ID when a valid playerSrc is passed.Examples:Lua-- Let's assume source is a valid ID
local pedId = GetPlayerPed(source);

-- If pedId is valid (not equal to 0)
if pedId ~= 0 then
    -- Do something with this ped!
end
codeBlocks:
-- Let's assume source is a valid ID
local pedId = GetPlayerPed(source);

-- If pedId is valid (not equal to 0)
if pedId ~= 0 then
    -- Do something with this ped!
end
